verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: laid] [ARGM-PRD: out] [ARG1: a stark choice for North Korea 's Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-TMP: ahead of their planned summit next month] : Abandon nuclear weapons and be rewarded with " protections , " or risk being overthrown and possible death if the arsenal remains .
